ModMetaData.name: More Movement Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 22 new movement genes, 11 Runner Genes and 11 Naked/Clothed Speed Genes.
Fast Runners - Adds to base speed Runner: +0.05 Slightly Fast Runner: +0.1 Fast Runner(vanilla): +0.2 Notably Fast Runner: +0.3 Very Fast Runner(vanilla): +0.4 Extremely Fast Runner +0.5 Super Fast Runner +0.6
Slow Runners - Subtracts from base speed Marginally Slow Runner: -0.05 Somewhat Slow Runner: -0.1 Slow Runner(vanilla): -0.2 Notably Slow Runner: -0.3 Very Slow Runner: -0.4 Extremely Slow Runner: -0.5 Super Slow Runner: -0.6
Naked Speeds - Bonus speed while naked, penalty while clothed Decent Naked Speed: +0.05 -0.1 Naked Speed(vanilla): +0.1 -0.2 Notable Naked Speed: +0.15 -0.3 Fast Naked Speed: +0.2 -0.4 Extreme Naked Speed: +0.25 -0.5 Super Naked Speed: +0.3 -0.6
Clothed Speeds - Bonus speed while clothed, penalty while naked - Because it is relatively easy to get clothes, the bonus is lower, and complexity is higher. These genes will be felt most in the early game, before a workshop is built. Decent Clothed Speed: +0.0 -0.1 Clothed Speed: +0.05 -0.2 Notable Clothed Speed: +0.1 -0.3 Fast Clothed Speed: +0.15 -0.4 Extreme Clothed Speed: +0.2 -0.5 Super Clothed Speed: +0.25 -0.6
Included in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2985153870]More Biotech Style Genes - All in One[/url]
